title: MPfree: Blank Spaces – Hold Fast
content:
Is summer over already? Has it begun yet? I’m not quite sure to be perfectly honest; the drab weather we’ve experienced in the UK over the past couple of months has me longing to uproot, leave England behind and set sail for a place where the sun occasionally breaks through the clouds.

This track from London musician Blank Spaces appears to echo my sentiments entirely, if not through the lyrics but through the melancholic sound.

Coming in at almost six minutes, Hold Fast is upbeat to a point; the hook is lively enough, the percussion section is steadfast yet the lyrics are slightly more downcast. ‘Smiling although your heart is breaking with the pain of it’ and ‘from a kiss to an unanswered call’, just two of the examples of the storytelling lyrical content of the track. Upon further listens, more intricacies are revealed to lie within Hold Fast, however it’s still primarily a classic pop track, and there’s nothing at all wrong with that when it’s done this well. Check out the video below, and head over to Blank Spaces’ bandcamp for a free download of Hold Fast.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
